name: tapunium-z--held
effect: Held: Allows tapu koko, tapu lele, tapu bulu, and tapu fini to upgrade natures madness into guardian of alola.
short_effect: Held: Allows the Tapus to upgrade Nature’s Madness into Guardian of Alola.
flavor_text: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades the tapu’s Nature’s Madness to a Z-Move.
